definitions: Pigs collectively. Also figurative: coarse, debased, or uncivilized people considered collectively. Now somewhat rare.
A place where pigs are kept or bred; a pigsty or piggery. Also figurative: a building or room likened to this in being very unclean, untidy, etc.
Objectionable or deplorable actions or behaviour; especially underhand, illicit, or scandalous activity.
